meanings.definition: The action of inuring or becoming inured.
meanings.sent1: The inurements of daily exercise helped him build strength.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the inurements to cold weather made her more resilient.
meanings.sent3: The inurements to spicy food turned him into a fire-breathing dragon at dinner parties.
meanings.sent4: Her inurements to rejection were like a shield against disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The inurements to hard work were evident in his successful career.

meanings.definition: Things that inure or become inured.
meanings.sent1: The inurements of nature include the ability to adapt to different environments.
meanings.sent2: She collected various inurements from her travels around the world.
meanings.sent3: The inurements in her backpack seemed to have a mind of their own, always shifting around.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with inurements of past adventures, each holding a special memory.
meanings.sent5: The inurements of time had weathered the old statue, giving it a sense of history.
